short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trigger a webhook when your browser sends a request to a particular domain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:
🌐 Domain-Specific Triggers: You can specify the domains that will activate your webhooks, and the extension will handle the rest.
🔐 Secure and Private: "Webhook on Request" does not store any personal information.
🌟 Simple Setup: You can set up your webhooks and domains using a JSON file.

Webhook icon by Icons8.
